ch0122_80_yo/0101_0701_01_10:
Alola! I was waiting for you to show up,
[Name:PlayerNickname ]!
ch0122_80_yo/0101_0701_02_10:
I’m looking forward to all the discoveries we’ll
make today!
ch0122_80_yo/7101_0701_01_10:
Alola’s all about the beautiful sea and wide-open
beaches!
ch0122_80_yo/7101_0701_02_10:
The views are amazing, and there’s a lot of
people out there who work hard to protect them!
ch0122_80_yo/7101_0701_03_10:
I once had a part-time job chucking stranded
Pyukumuku back into the ocean...
ch0122_80_yo/7102_0701_01_10:
I hear the Hano Grand Hotel on Akala Island has a
huge golf course.
ch0122_80_yo/7102_0701_02_10:
I wasn’t allowed inside, which made me curious
about what it looks like!
ch0122_80_yo/7103_0701_01_10:
Hearing stories from everyone on Pasio makes me
wanna visit other regions!
ch0122_80_yo/7103_0701_02_10:
I’ve already seen a lot thanks to the pictures and
videos that people have shown me...
ch0122_80_yo/7103_0701_03_10:
But I still want to visit those places in person and
meet the people and Pokémon that live there!
ch0122_80_yo/7104_0701_01_10: Ultra Beasts are Pokémon from a different world...
ch0122_80_yo/7104_0701_02_10: There are people who live in other worlds, too...
ch0122_80_yo/7104_0701_03_10:
The way we live and think may be different, but
I think it’d be great if we could all get along.
ch0122_80_yo/7105_0701_01_10:
It’s amazing how you can immediately get along
with all sorts of different people and Pokémon,
[Name:PlayerNickname ].
ch0122_80_yo/7105_0701_02_10:
You seem like someone who could form a sync
pair with any Pokémon—even an Ultra Beast!
ch0122_80_yo/7105_0701_03_10: That said, I’m no slouch, either!
ch0122_80_yo/7105_0701_04_10: Let’s see which of us can befriend more Pokémon!
ch0122_80_yo/1701_0701_01_10: Alola! I found this while I was out exploring!
ch0122_80_yo/1701_0702_01_10: I hope it helps on your adventures!
ch0122_80_yo/2501_0701_01_10:
You can find apparel shops all over Alola,
probably because we get so many tourists.
ch0122_80_yo/2501_0701_02_10:
Whenever Lillie sees a shop, she walks right in...
and before you know it, she’s back with shopping
bags in her hands!
ch0122_80_yo/2501_0701_03_10:
I often changed up my look whenever I visited a
new town, depending on how I felt at the time!
ch0122_80_yo/2501_0702_01_10:
If you’re looking for something besides apparel
shops, the community center in Malie City has a
flea market.
ch0122_80_yo/2501_0702_02_10:
They have some pretty rare stuff—including
fashion items, too.
ch0122_80_yo/2501_0702_03_10:
I guess sygna suits would be a rare fashion item
exclusive to Pasio, huh?
ch0122_80_yo/2511_0701_01_10:
Ultra Beasts are Pokémon that came from another
world.
ch0122_80_yo/2511_0701_02_10:
A lot of people and organizations are researching
Ultra Beasts, but there’s still so much that we don’t
know about them...
ch0122_80_yo/2511_0701_03_10:
But you know what? Mysteries make things that
much more exciting!
ch0122_80_yo/2511_0702_01_10: The fun of an adventure is knowing the unknown!
ch0122_80_yo/2511_0702_02_10:
I’ve got a feeling that I can encounter all sorts
of things here on Pasio that I never knew about
before.
ch0122_80_yo/3001_0701_01_10:
When you’re basking in the morning sun, don’t you
just feel like today’s your day? Like you can do
anything?
ch0122_80_yo/3003_0701_01_10: Alola! Let’s enjoy the afternoon at full power, too!
ch0122_80_yo/3005_0701_01_10:
There’re fun adventures waiting for us tomorrow,
so let’s rest up!
